key.name: did-initial-setup
key.description: Set to true after the user has run the first-time setup wizard.

key.name: sort-on-surname
key.description: If this is set to true, the list of contacts will be sorted on their surnames. Otherwise, it will be sorted on the first names of the contacts.

key.name: window-height
key.summary: The default height of the contacts window.
key.description: If the window size has not been changed by the user yet this will be used as the initial value for the height of the window.

key.name: window-width
key.summary: The default width of the contacts window.
key.description: If the window size has not been changed by the user yet this will be used as the initial value for the width of the window.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Stores if the window is currently maximized.
